long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extensions enables every profile in LinkedIn to have a small easy section that will allow you to add tags to the profile 
You can then quickly find all contacts with the same tags - all within linkedin.com
Use these tags to quickly add and tag with anything you can think of #interestedleads #dontsendmessages or #followup_august2020.
Intuitive lists show all of the contacts which have a particular tag - so you more quickly organize your contacts.

This extension is under active development in 2021 - so please suggest additions!
